content: advanced beginner friendly this versatile dishcloth offers the best of both worlds a cloth to scrub and a cloth to buff using two of my favourite stitches and crochet techniques this simple but visually captivating dishcloth offers endless colour combinations to create a drawer full of fun and effective cleaning cloths use one colour or two switch it up between tonals and solids or even your favourite colours from two different brands this pattern is worked in turned row and may require colour-changing depending on your yarn and colour choices please enjoy this pattern for free
